get_hash() → str[source]¶

Get the unique hash of metadata. Hash is generated based on “stream-name + data_descriptor + module-metadata” :returns: hash id of metadata :rtype: str

is_valid() → bool[source]¶

check whether all required fields are set :returns: True if fields are set or throws an exception in case of missing values :rtype: bool

Exception:
ValueError: if metadata fields are not set
